fields.title: Classic Granny Square
fields.summary: A timeless crochet granny square pattern, perfect for blankets and projects.
fields.description: Learn how to crochet a classic granny square using US terms. This easy pattern works in the round with double crochet clusters and chain spaces. Use multiple colors for a patchwork effect, or a single color for a modern look. Great for beginners!

fields.title: Crochet Round Mug Coaster
fields.summary: A quick and easy round crochet coaster in cotton yarn.
fields.description: Crochet this simple and practical round mug coaster using single and double crochet stitches. Made with cotton yarn, it’s durable and washable. Perfect for protecting surfaces while adding a handmade touch to your home.

fields.title: Chunky Beginner Scarf
fields.summary: A cozy beginner scarf made with super bulky yarn and single crochet.
fields.description: This beginner-friendly scarf uses only single crochet stitches and super bulky yarn, making it perfect for first-time crocheters. Quick to work up and super warm, you can add fringe for an extra stylish touch.

fields.title: Mini Amigurumi Heart
fields.summary: A small, cute stuffed heart, perfect for gifts or keychains.
fields.description: Crochet this adorable mini heart using basic amigurumi techniques. Worked in continuous rounds and stuffed with fiberfill, this makes a lovely gift, decoration, or keychain charm. A great beginner introduction to amigurumi.

fields.title: Simple Crochet Tote Bag
fields.summary: A stylish and practical crochet tote bag for everyday use.
fields.description: This tote bag is made from durable cotton yarn and worked in rounds from a rectangular base. Double crochet stitches build the sides, and sturdy handles are crocheted directly onto the bag. Perfect for shopping, books, or craft projects.

fields.title: Crochet Headband / Ear Warmer
fields.summary: A simple and cozy crochet headband to keep ears warm.
fields.description: This beginner-friendly crochet headband is made in simple rows and sewn together with an optional twist for a turban style. Great stash buster project and perfect for quick gifts.

fields.title: Simple Dishcloth
fields.summary: A quick, practical crochet dishcloth made with cotton yarn.
fields.description: This simple dishcloth uses only single crochet stitches, making it an easy and useful beginner project. Made with cotton yarn, it’s eco-friendly and washable.

fields.title: Crochet Bookmark
fields.summary: A lightweight crochet bookmark with tassel.
fields.description: This slim crochet bookmark is made in simple rows of single crochet and finished with a tassel. Perfect for gifts or using up scrap yarn.

fields.title: Crochet Flower Appliqué
fields.summary: A cute 5-petal crochet flower to add to projects.
fields.description: Quick and fun, this crochet flower is made in a magic ring with double crochets forming petals. Great as an embellishment for clothes, bags, or home decor.

fields.title: Crochet Beanie (Basic Hat)
fields.description: This beanie is worked from the crown down using double crochet stitches. A versatile pattern you can adapt in size and color for everyone.

fields.title: Crochet Basket
fields.summary: A sturdy crochet basket for storage and organization.
fields.description: Worked in rounds with thick cotton yarn, this basket is strong and practical. Perfect for holding craft supplies, toys, or bathroom essentials.

fields.title: Crochet Baby Booties
fields.summary: Adorable crochet baby booties with a strap.
fields.description: These sweet baby booties are worked from the sole up, shaped with decreases, and finished with a strap closure. A thoughtful handmade gift for new arrivals.

fields.title: Phone Pouch with Button
fields.summary: A snug crochet phone pouch with a buttoned flap.
fields.description: Worked bottom-up in the round with single crochet for a dense fabric, then split for a flat flap and add a simple button loop. Fits most smartphones; adjust width/height by starting chain and row count.

fields.title: Cup Cozy (Sleeve)
fields.summary: Reusable sleeve to protect hands from hot cups.
fields.description: Fast, eco-friendly cozy worked in the round with half double crochet; add a simple rib by working back-loop-only rows. Stretchy and fits standard takeaway cups.

fields.title: Plant Pot Cozy
fields.summary: A textured cozy to dress up plant pots.
fields.description: Start with a flat circle base (increases), then work sides without increases. Use waistcoat stitch or regular single crochet for a neat knit-look. Sized for 10–12 cm pots—adjust base diameter for other sizes.

fields.title: Mesh Produce Bag
fields.summary: Lightweight, stretchy produce bag with drawstring.
fields.description: Bottom-up bag using chains and double crochet to form mesh; finished with a sturdy single-crochet band and a chain-cord drawstring. Packs small and carries a surprising amount.
